Ready2Frag  -  High Performance Game Servers, VPS Hosting, and Dedicated Hosting.
 
About Us:
 
Ready2Frag, the gaming-oriented hosting branch of HostVenom LLC, exists to offer powerful and reliable hosting service at fair prices. With years of experience in the hosting industry and a relentless dedication to consistently improving what we offer to our clients, you'll be well-served by Ready2Frag.
 
Our hosting solutions are based on company-owned Supermicro hardware. With Intel Xeon E3v2 processors, DDR3 ECC RAM, Samsung 840 Evo SSDs in LSI RAID-10, and 1Gbps Network Ports, our VPS hosting services will deliver insane I/O, awesome CPU performance, and excellent network speeds.
 


 
We include the following with all of our VPS services:
  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • Premium Chicago, IL Data Center: Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells
  • Free DDoS Protection: Up to 4Gbps/4MPPS.
  • InterNAP FCP Route Optimization
  • * Limited Time: FREE Double Bandwidth

FAQ
 
Q: Do you have a network speed test or test IP?
A: Please open a ticket to get access to a test IP and speed tests on our network.
 
Q: What payment processors do you use?
A: We accept payments via PayPal, Stripe, and Coinbase (Bitcoin).
 
Q: What do you allow on your VPS services?
A: Please see our Acceptable Usage Policy for more information.
 
Q: Do you have discounts for longer payment periods?
A: We allow up to 3-month pre-pay for VPS services. With this deal, you get an additional 5% off.
 
Q: How long does setup take?
A: Your VPS will be set up instantly after payment is received.
